name: Hunter of antiques
description:
Just one wrong step and you die
If you loving run, jump, traps and corridors this game is for you.

explore dungeon corridors, overcome the traps .

Hidden corridors in the dungeon hide secrets and traps. It is up to you to examine the entire prison and find secret secrets in these forgotten corridors that hide traps, just one wrong step and the dungeon buries you. Be careful at every step.

Explore the dungeon

Explore all levels, every corner

Watch out for traps

  • Spikes
  • Holes
  • Trick floors
  • Lava
  • Labyrinths
